scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm install && mkdir dist && cp -R node_modules dist/ && cp index.html dist/ && cp -R images dist/
scripts.minimize-build: rm -r dist/node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/js && rm -r dist/node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/less && rm -r dist/node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/metadata && rm -r dist/node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/scss && rm -r dist/node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/svgs && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Mono && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-Arabic && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-Devanagari && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-Hebrew && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-KR && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-Thai && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-Thai-Looped && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Sans-Variable && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/IBM-Plex-Serif && rm -r dist/node_modules/@ibm/plex/scss && rm -r dist/node_modules/bootstrap/js && rm -r dist/node_modules/bootstrap/scss && rm -r dist/node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js
